subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: L.S.U.’s Matt Flynn and Ohio State’s Todd Boeckman, the two starting quarterbacks in the B.C.S. title game on Monday, are more caretakers than playmakers.
snippet: L.S.U.’s Matt Flynn and Ohio State’s Todd Boeckman, the two starting quarterbacks in the B.C.S. title game on Monday, are more caretakers than playmakers.
